name: Espresso
description: A concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: A coffee drink that consists of a shot of espresso, steamed milk, and a layer of frothy milk foam.

name: Cold Brew
description: A refreshing coffee made by steeping coarsely ground coffee beans in cold water for an extended period.

name: Latte
description: A creamy coffee made with a shot of espresso and steamed milk, often topped with a small amount of foam.
